title: Eat and Drink in Kings Cross London
name: Eat and Drink in Kings Cross London
description:
A Map by Billper

Residents recommend places to eat and drink in Kings Cross (not the usual chains)

properties.name: 6 St Chad's Place (bar and restaurant)
properties.description: Posted by Billper Excellent bar and small restaurant, unconventional, light and airy plenty of space to stand or slouch outside away from traffic

properties.name: Acorn House - green restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Billper Excellent, highly reviewed eco restaurant. that does eco without being even being slightly grungy. 69 Swinton Street 020 7812 1842

properties.name: Addis (ethiopian restaurant)
properties.description: Posted by Billper 42 caledonian road london

properties.name: Gran Sasso cafe - 44 Caledonian Road
properties.description: Posted by Billper Very good neighbourhood cafe. unusually good pizza. also serves wine.

properties.name: Harrington's Fresh (upmarket cafe)
properties.description: Posted by Billper  48 wicklow street londonhigh end french cafe front to corporate catering business

properties.name: K C Continental stores (italian deli)
properties.description: Posted by Billper 26 caledonian road londonSuperb Italian deli that transports you back to the 1960s. Excellent sandwiches and meats. Calm and unruffled in face of changing Kings Cross

properties.name: La Primavera Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Billper 341 caledonian road londongreat local cafe, cheerful staff, decent quality and value

properties.name: Lincoln Lounge (bar)
properties.description: Posted by Billper52 york way londonunique non brewery bar, dance and chill out spot on york way. usually not open saturdays.

properties.name: My Kitchen (Chinese restaurant/take-away)
properties.description: Posted by Billper 239 caledonian road londonGood cheap and cheerful, clean, bright and airy chinese restaurant on the Cally Road a godsend for north kings cross. Very rapid local delivery.

properties.name: Royal Thai (restaurant)
properties.description: Posted by Billper 52 caledonian road londonexcellent but tiny thai restaurant. possibly the spiciest pad thai in london, charming staff, atmospheric, BYO alcohol, low prices. have the coconut milk drink 020 7837 7755, 52 york way

properties.name: The Cross Kings Pub
properties.description: Posted by Billper 126 york way londonfabulously independent pub free of all chain and brewery tat. good food

properties.name: The Ruby Lounge (bar)
properties.description: Posted by Billpergood relaxed local (non chain) bar

properties.name: Yasar Food Market 319 caledonain road
properties.description: Posted by Billper  319 caledonian road londonexcellent local Turkish family deli emphasis on natural, organic produce. brilliant turkish delight

properties.name: YumYum (thai delivery take away) 020 7278 4737
properties.description: Posted by Billper 48 caledonian road londonsmashing cheap high speed thai/asian take away with rapid delivery. also has a three tables if you want to eat in
